\catcode`\{=1 % left brace is begin-group character
\catcode`\}=2 % right brace is end-group character


%%%%%%%%%%%%
%%
%% registers


%% toks

\toks0 {=}

1: = : \the\toks0

%% numbered count

%% oktal and hex integers
%% (not yet implmented in ExTeX)

\count50='123
2: 83 : \the\count50

\count60="123
3: 291 : \the\count60

%% from here decimal

\count40=12
4: 12 : \the\count40

\multiply \count40 by 3
5: 36 : \the\count40

\advance \count40 by -6
6: 30 : \the\count40

\divide \count40 by 8
7: 3 : \the\count40

\advance \count40 by 10
8: 13 : \the\count40

%% named count

\countdef\nase = 40
9: 13 : \the\nase

\advance \nase by 5
10: 18 : \the\nase

\multiply\nase by 4579
11: 82422 : \the\nase

\divide\nase by 3
12: 27474 : \the\nase

\multiply\nase by 78164
13: 2147477736 : \the\nase

\divide\nase by -133
14: -16146449 : \the\nase

\multiply \nase by -0
15: 0 : \the\nase

%% numbered dimen

\dimen2=1pt
16: 1.0pt : \the\dimen2

\multiply\dimen2 by 2
17: 2.0pt : \the\dimen2

17a: \dimen32 = 1.5\dimen2
3.0pt : \the\dimen32

\advance\dimen2 by 3em
18: 32.00005pt : \the\dimen2

\advance\dimen2 by -100000sp
19: 30.47417pt : \the\dimen2

\divide\dimen2 by 2
20: 15.23708pt : \the\dimen2

%% named dimen

\dimendef\hand = 2
21: 15.23708pt : \the\hand

\advance\hand by -.23708pt
22: 15.0pt : \the\hand

\divide\hand by 7
23: 2.14285pt : \the\hand

\multiply\hand by 7
24: 14.99997pt : \the\hand

\advance\hand by -13.99997pt
25: 1.0pt : \the\hand


%% The remaining can't be used with original TeX

%% numbered real

% \real3=2.5
% real3 (2.5): \the\real3

% \advance\real3 by 22.5
% plus 22.5: \the\real3

% \divide\real3 by 3
% durch 3: \the\real3

% \multiply\real3 by 3
% mal 3: \the\real3

% \divide\real3 by 3
% durch 3: \the\real3

% \advance\real3 by -.3333333333333333
% minus .3333333333333333: \the\real3

% % \divide\real3 by 0
% % durch NULL: \the\real3

%% named real

% \realdef\bart=3
% bart (real3): \the\bart

% \divide\bart by 3
% durch 3: \the\bart

% \advance\bart by 2,456789
% plus 2,456789: \the\bart

% \multiply\bart by ,1
% mal .1: \the\bart

% \advance\bart by -.5123455666666666
% minus .5123455666666666: \the\bart

% \the\toks0

% \realdef\haar=40
% haar (real40) leer: \the\haar

% \real40=1.41421357
% real40 jetzt: \the\real40

% haar jetzt (als 000.00000) \the\printformat{000.00000}\haar

% haar jetzt (als 00,000000) \the\printformat{00,000000}\haar

% haar nochmal: \the\haar

% \the\toks0

\end
